data.name: Rezzil Player
data.description:
Unleash your inner champion with Rezzil Player, the ultimate VR sports extravaganza! Boasting 160+ adrenaline-pumping levels and 40 high-octane sports gear items, it's the undisputed king of sports apps!

Football Field General:
Sharpen your quarterback prowess, unleash devastating throws, and skyrocket your arm strength in this immersive training experience. Dare to conquer the big leagues!

Football Pocket Slide:
Master the art of evading defense, finesse your pocket presence, and react like a pro in this heart-pounding quarterback showdown.

Soccer Headers:
Revolutionize your heading skills with 4 cutting-edge training games designed to translate your virtual prowess into real-world domination – no ball impact necessary!

Goalkeeper Shot Stopper:
Become the ultimate guardian of the net with lightning-fast saves and razor-sharp reflexes in this thrilling goalkeeping soccer challenge.

Hoops Vision:
Elevate your basketball game to new heights in this electrifying rhythm workout, honing your court vision while pushing your physical limits.

Reaction Wall:
Unleash your agility and conquer the leaderboards in this dynamic reaction time challenge. Choose your wall size and outshine your competition in any sport!

Challenges:
Embrace the ultimate test of skill across diverse games and etch your name in the hallowed Hall of Fame. Are you ready to claim your throne?

Please note: Meta Quest 1 support will end on 31st March 2024

translations.long_description:
Rezzil Player 22 is an ever-growing collection of athlete designed training games and exercises that will improve your fitness and reaction times across a wide range of sports.
 
Want the reaction times of an F1 driver? The fitness level of a pro athlete? Step into Rezzil Player 22 and train in drills developed with the world's best sports professionals.  

Rezzil is the world’s most advanced gym, in your living room.
 
Headers 
Improve your football heading technique without ball impact in over 60 training led levels that can be used in the real world.
 
Hoops Vision
Push your fitness level with our Basketball rhythm game, an intense workout that will also improve your vision on the court.
 
Reaction Wall 
Improve your reaction times in any sport. Hit the lights as quick as you can and see how you stack up on the world leaderboards.
 
Blokz Game
When trainings done, head over to the Rezzil Spaceport and take on the bots in a fast-paced racket game full of mayhem and explosions.
